korean: 오늘 퇴사하시는 선배님한테 업무를 인수인계 받았다.
모르는 부분은 질문했고, 선배님이 친절하게 설명해주셨다.
다음 주부터 혼자 해야 한다고 생각하니까 부담되지만 잘해야지.
english: I received a handover from a senior colleague who's leaving the company today.
They organized everything so thoroughly in documents—I'm really grateful.
I asked about things I didn't understand, and they kindly explained everything.
It's a bit overwhelming knowing I'll be on my own next week, but I'll do my best.
